titleStmt.title: Sacred hymns Consisting of fifti select psalms of David and others, paraphrastically turned into English verse. And by Robert Tailour, set to be sung in five parts, as also to the viole, and lute or orph-arion. Published for the vse of such as delight in the exercise of music in hir original honour.
titleStmt.author: Sandys, Edwin, Sir, 1561-1629.

titleStmt.title: Sacred hymns Consisting of fifti select psalms of David and others, paraphrastically turned into English verse. And by Robert Tailour, set to be sung in five parts, as also to the viole, and lute or orph-arion. Published for the vse of such as delight in the exercise of music in hir original honour.
titleStmt.author: Sandys, Edwin, Sir, 1561-1629.
Tailour, Robert, fl. 1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham, by the assignment of the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: With a final contents leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
